name: Soul Pieces
description:
Traverse the graveyard collecting the glowing soul pieces to recall your story.
wasd and arrow keys move

spacebar jumps

hold down ctrl if you get lost and want to find the closest soul piece

Watch out for bats and lava.

Credits:

  • music: https://opengameart.org/content/sorrow
  • tiled importer: https://kitty-unity.readthedocs.io/en/latest
  • sound effects: https://opengameart.org/content/fantasy-sound-effects-library
  • https://opengameart.org/content/level-up-power-up-coin-get-13-sounds
  • https://opengameart.org/content/flap-splat-poo-yo-frankie
